thread.section_title: Hotel La Sanguine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Checking in laptops
thread.title_full: Checking in laptops - Review of Hotel La Sanguine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jacobkranz92
title: Checking in laptops
text: I had an appointment at the US embassy, but did not know that I could not bring my laptop into the embassy. The guard told me to find a hotel that would hold onto it for me. I checked a few nearby hotels, but could not find one to hold it until I got to La Sanguine. It cost only cost 5 Euros for them to hold onto my bag so that I could make my appointment at the embassy. They kept my bag behind the front desk for the couple hours that they had it. The people at the hotel were very friendly and helped me out, otherwise I would have had to reschedule my appointment.
